Script.description: Disables the alert, confirm, prompt, and print functions.
Script.name: Disable Prompt Functions

Script.description: Adds one of two stylesheets to a Wayback Machine snapshot's page depending on its timestamp.
Script.name: Add Stylesheets To Wayback Machine Snapshots

Script.description: Converts non-standard Crescendo or LiveUpdate embed tags to standard ones.
Script.name: Crescendo To Standard Embed

Script.description: Converts bgsound to embed tags. Avoids converting bgsound tags whose audio is already being played using an embed tag. Adapted from: https://userscripts-mirror.org/scripts/show/1827
Script.name: Bgsound To Embed

Script.description: Makes a random audio and video element start playing as soon as possible. This includes both the audio and video tags as well as any object and embed tags that specify audio or video MIME types.
Script.name: Autoplay Random Audio And Video

Script.description: Fixes an issue where a video played by the VLC plugin is displayed in the wrong position on the page. Also fixes an issue where embedded media that isn't supposed to loop forever is played twice by VLC. The first fix removes the video's controls so the script allows you to toggle pause by clicking on it. Videos can also be played from the beginning by right-clicking on them.
Script.name: Fix Vlc Embed

Script.description: Prevents Flash movies from executing JavaScript code or navigating to a different page.
Script.name: Disable Flash Script Access

Script.description: Forces the Java Plugin to use a specific JRE version and makes every applet run in its own JVM instance.
Script.name: Force Java Applet Version

Script.description: Picks a random skin for the YAMAHA MIDPLUG for XG plugin's player if one isn't set explicitly.
Script.name: Random Yamaha Midplug Skin

Script.description: Removes header and footer ads inserted by free hosting services like Angelfire and Tripod.
Script.name: Remove Free Hosting Ads
